meanings.definition: A device for measuring the density of gases.
meanings.sent1: The dasymeter helped us find out how heavy the air was.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use a dasymeter to calculate the weight of different gases.
meanings.sent3: The dasymeter was so accurate, it even measured the density of the invisible gas in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a dasymeter, always analyzing and calculating the atmosphere around her.
meanings.sent5: The dasymeter beeped loudly as it detected the density of the gas in the container.

meanings.definition: A tool used to determine the specific gravity of a liquid.
meanings.sent1: We used the dasymeter to figure out how dense the liquid was.
meanings.sent2: The dasymeter showed us the specific gravity of the liquid in the beaker.
meanings.sent3: The dasymeter made a funny noise when we tested the density of the water.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a dasymeter, always gauging the weight of emotions in the room.
meanings.sent5: The dasymeter hummed softly as it measured the specific gravity of the liquid sample.

meanings.definition: An instrument for measuring the density of solids.
meanings.sent1: The dasymeter helped us determine how heavy the solid object was.
meanings.sent2: Using the dasymeter, we could accurately measure the density of the solid material.
meanings.sent3: The dasymeter beeped happily when we tested the weight of the rock.
meanings.sent4: His heart acted like a dasymeter, always assessing the solidity of his decisions.
meanings.sent5: The dasymeter clicked as it calculated the density of the solid block.
